rules.to: (	   $notifcationId := $flowContext("notificationId");	   $canellationToken := $flowContext("cancellationToken");	   $cancelled := $notifcationId = $canellationToken;	   {	       "autoremote":{	           "notification":{	               "id": $notifcationId,	               "title": "Home Assistant",	               "text": "Travis CI Started",	               "icon": "https://www.home-assistant.io/images/components/alexa/alexa-108x108.png",	               "indeterminateprogress": true,	               "action1name": $cancelled ? "Cancel restart" : null,	               "action1": $cancelled ? "cancelrestart id=" & $notifcationId : null	   	   	       	           },	           "devices":["brad"]		   	       }			   }		)

name: Switch syncronisation - calls light turn_on or turn_off when appropriate binary_sensor changes
Put Hot Water State URL & payload
